footer.aboutContent: Através lets you explore the world through opposites. Search any location and instantly find its antipode - the exact opposite point on Earth. Compare places, discover fun facts and leave or uncover messages left by others at these mirrored locations. Messages are visible within a 100 km radius to protect privacy, and your exact location is never stored or shared.
privacyContent: At Através, we take your privacy seriously. Here's what you should know:
• We only store your language preference in your browser's local storage to provide a consistent experience.
• We use anonymous analytics to understand how people use Através, but we never track individual users.
• Messages are only visible within a 100 km radius to protect privacy.
• Your exact location is never stored or shared.
• We don't use any tracking cookies or collect personal information.
If you have any questions about privacy, please contact us.
footer.craftedWith: Crafted with React, Firebase, and the spirit of global wonder.
